name: Quattrocento Sans
description: Quattrocento Sans is a classic, elegant and sober typeface family. Warm, readable and not intrusive. It's the perfect sans-serif companion for Quattrocento . The wide and open letterforms and large x-height make it very legible for body text at small sizes. All the tiny details that only shows up at bigger sizes make it also great for display use.
author: Impallari Type
